panels.visual: Wide action shot: The party battles the Librarian. Armando's spells splash uselessly against it - magic resistant. Corpium charges with Patricia II raised. Eurostras circles for an opening. The creature's wings spread wide, black sand trailing.
panels.dialogue:
Armando: "My magic does nothing!"
Corpium: "Then we use steel!"

panels.visual: Wide shot: Patricia II cleaves through the Librarian's skeletal form. The creature collapses, disintegrating into black sand that flows back toward the bowl. Its final words echo as it dies - but dies it does, for now.
panels.dialogue: Librarian (disintegrating): "Knowledge of The Library is a heavy burden... you will learn this."
